name: Heirloom (AtticusFinn)
description:
It's your time to begin the pilgrimage your ancestors have done for decades, will you be able to come back in one piece or will you perish along the way? 

Heirloom is a 2D platformer inspired by retro games, 1bit and textmode art.

Run, jump and avoid obstacles through 7 simple but challenging levels. Explore a beautiful, hand-crafted pixel world. meet captivating NPCs and venture up to the Old Summit and back to retrieve the family Heirloom.

Move←→JumpZ
Interact↑Tilt camera
↓ 
Resize Screen F Toggle CRT T Restart R
  • 7 handcrafted levels 
  • 5 unique areas to explore
  • A peculiar ability to discover
  • Captivating NPCs
  • A rich story unveiling the family tradition
  • Old school CRT effect
  • Minimalist pixel art graphics

Made by Atticus Finn

This game's still in development. Leave a comment below or reach me on twitter or take this short survey to give me your feedback, It'll help me make this game better!
